issue.title: Test failures in arquitectures different to amd64

content.raw:
I just peeked at the [armel build failure](https://buildd.debian.org/status/fetch.php?pkg=ignition-math2&arch=armel&ver=2.1.1%2Bdfsg1-1&stamp=1434737920):
~~~
      Start 25: UNIT_RotationSpline_TEST
      Start 26: check_UNIT_RotationSpline_TEST
      Start 27: UNIT_SignalStats_TEST
      Start 28: check_UNIT_SignalStats_TEST
25/40 Test #28: check_UNIT_SignalStats_TEST ......***Failed    0.06 sec
Checking for test results in /«BUILDDIR»/ignition-math2-2.1.1+dfsg1/obj-arm-linux-gnueabi/test_results/UNIT_SignalStats_TEST.xml
Cannot find results, writing failure results to /«BUILDDIR»/ignition-math2-2.1.1+dfsg1/obj-arm-linux-gnueabi/test_results/UNIT_SignalStats_TEST.xml

26/40 Test #25: UNIT_RotationSpline_TEST .........   Passed    0.08 sec
27/40 Test #27: UNIT_SignalStats_TEST ............   Passed    0.09 sec
28/40 Test #26: check_UNIT_RotationSpline_TEST ...   Passed    0.10 sec
~~~

They are running `make test -j4`, and i t's running `check_UNIT_SignalStats_TEST` before `UNIT_SignalStats_TEST`. `UNIT_SignalStats_TEST` passes, but the `check_` test fails because it runs first.
content.html:
I just peeked at the armel build failure:

      Start 25: UNIT_RotationSpline_TEST
      Start 26: check_UNIT_RotationSpline_TEST
      Start 27: UNIT_SignalStats_TEST
      Start 28: check_UNIT_SignalStats_TEST
25/40 Test #28: check_UNIT_SignalStats_TEST ......***Failed    0.06 sec
Checking for test results in /«BUILDDIR»/ignition-math2-2.1.1+dfsg1/obj-arm-linux-gnueabi/test_results/UNIT_SignalStats_TEST.xml
Cannot find results, writing failure results to /«BUILDDIR»/ignition-math2-2.1.1+dfsg1/obj-arm-linux-gnueabi/test_results/UNIT_SignalStats_TEST.xml

26/40 Test #25: UNIT_RotationSpline_TEST .........   Passed    0.08 sec
27/40 Test #27: UNIT_SignalStats_TEST ............   Passed    0.09 sec
28/40 Test #26: check_UNIT_RotationSpline_TEST ...   Passed    0.10 sec

They are running make test -j4, and i t's running check_UNIT_SignalStats_TEST before UNIT_SignalStats_TEST. UNIT_SignalStats_TEST passes, but the check_ test fails because it runs first.
